channel.title: Dead Emote + GFX
channel.description:
Hello all I dont ask for help often, but I cant seem to figure this out, Ive been playing around with this for an hour, or so, and I decided to come tot this.
Im tyring to change the Dieing emote, but I cant seem to find it anyhere in server Files, could anyone please tell me where it might be or what to search, Ive serached for it on 2 completely different sources, if anyone can help and will help please,
Rep++ will be given :)

item.title: Dead Emote + GFX
item.dc:creator: @dutchboy dutchboy
item.description:
@dutchboy wrote:

search for this [code]if (deathStage == 1) {
if (attacknpc > 0) { // was killed by a npc -bakatool
server.npcHandler.ResetAttackPlayer(attacknpc);
}
ResetAttack();
ResetAttackNPC();

		deathStage = 2;
		poisoned = false;
		poisonDmg = false;
		fighting = false;
		hits = 0;
		startAnimation(837);
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		deathTimer = System.currentTimeMillis();
		currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
		playerLevel[0] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]);
		playerLevel[1] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]);
		playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]);
		playerLevel[4] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]);
		playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]);
		playerLevel[6] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]);
		sendFrame126("Prayer: "+playerLevel[5]+"/"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])+"", 687);
		resetfollowers();
		refreshSkills();
		killMyNPCs();
		resetKnight();
		skulledBy = "";
	}[/code]

u can change the animation at startanimation(btw i already changed my dead emote, so it isnt the same as urs)

Read full topic

item.title: Dead Emote + GFX
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

[quote=“Projext, post:4, topic:310796”]What client version are you using?

317 is most likely the applyDead() method, which should be in the main java file.

525 is also applyDead, found in the player.java[/quote]
I cant find that anywhere I searched every file in this source
(ITS COMBATTSCAPE SOURCE) if that makes any differnece. I liek really need to figure this out lol X D!

Read full topic

item.title: Dead Emote + GFX
item.dc:creator: @Projext Projext
item.description:
@Projext wrote:

What client version are you using?

317 is most likely the applyDead() method, which should be in the main java file.

525 is also applyDead, found in the player.java

Read full topic

item.title: Dead Emote + GFX
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

sharecode:

firstly check The Client NotePad if that doesnt work in a folder there should be a Emote Notepad. i hope this helps

the emote lists are for emotes. not to change them…

also, it sounds like you have no idear what your talking about…

noobs, sorry but i couldnt find mine even though i have a cool emote
